text: Julius Dorpmüller (24 July 1869 in Elberfeld - 5 July 1945 in Malente) was the German minister of transport between 1937 and 1945. He was a member of the Cabinet Hitler. From 1926 to 1945, he was the Director-general of the "Deutsche Reichsbahn". Category:1869 births Category:1945 deaths Category:Government ministers of Nazi Germany Category:Holocaust perpetrators Category:Politicians from North Rhine-Westphalia Category:Politicians of the Nazi Party
title: Julius Dorpmüller
